data.title: Professional Headshot Booth
data.text:
The Office of Career Development & Professional Engagement is pleased to offer our Professional Headshot Booth as a free service to all students, alumni, faculty, and staff.

How do I make an appointment?

For current W&M students, no appointment is necessary. We welcome current students to use the booth Monday-Friday, 8 a.m. - 4:45 p.m. For student groups, please email [[career,Colleen Prosser]] to schedule a time to accommodate a group.

For W&M alumni, faculty and staff, please reserve a time to use our Professional Headshot Booth.

How does the Professional Headshot Booth work?

The Professional Headshot Booth is a self-service booth with a touch screen, high-quality lighting, and camera equipment. When your appointment begins, you will enter the Professional Headshot Booth, sit on the adjustable stool, and follow the prompts on the screen. You will enter your W&M email address, and accept the terms to continue. The screen will prompt you on how to pose and you will take three pictures that will be immediately emailed to you for downloading. You will be able to do additional editing once you have received your pictures.

How to prepare for your professional headshot:

Check out these tips on how to prepare for your headshot.
